mapper.insert: insert into submissions(created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, problem_id, user_id, result, time_cost, memory_cost, language, contest_id, real_run_id, remote_oj, username) values (#{createdAt},#{updatedAt},#{deletedAt},#{problemId},#{userId},#{result},#{timeCost},#{memoryCost},#{language},#{contestId},#{realRunId},#{remoteOj},#{username}) on duplicate key update updated_at = #{updatedAt}, result = #{result}, time_cost = #{timeCost}, memory_cost = #{memoryCost}, real_run_id = #{realRunId}

insert into submission_codes(created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, submission_id, source_code, code_length) values (#{createdAt},#{updatedAt},#{deletedAt},#{submissionId},#{sourceCode},#{codeLength}) on duplicate key update source_code = #{sourceCode}, code_length = #{codeLength}
